publisher: OG International Ltd (Europe) / O-Games, Inc (North America)

description.full: “Grip it and rip it” with the most authentic and realistic golf game. Featuring John ‘The Lion’ Daly, the game uses its unique ProStroke control system to deliver accurate golf shots. With no artificial barriers to shot performance, control is key. Beginners can hit good shots and expert players can hit great ones.  This demo showcases the following:  - Play a single player Quick Game over 3 holes (Par 3, 4 and 5) at The Belfry's Brabazon course or Mystic Rock - Take on John Daly in a Driving Challenge over 3 holes - Narrated by John Daly himself, the interactive tutorials are designed to help you master four crucial aspects of the game
description.short: “Grip it and rip it” with the most authentic and realistic golf game. Featuring John ‘The Lion’ Daly, the game uses its unique ProStroke control system to deliver accurate golf shots. This demo showcases the following: Play a single player Quick Game over 3 holes at The Belfry's Brabazon course or Mystic Rock. Take on John Daly in a Driving Challenge over 3 holes. Narrated by John Daly himself, the interactive tutorials are designed to help you master four crucial aspects of the game.
